name: SterilizationSNOMEDFindings
title: Sterilization SNOMED Findings
description: For Contraceptive eCQMs Approval for Trial Use application in Spring 2022; This set of values contains codes for female sterilization for contraception (e.g., bilateral tubal ligation, bilateral salpingectomy).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family planning - provision and use of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods),(Data Element Scope: Codes for surveillance or history of female sterilization (e.g., bilateral tubal ligation, bilateral salpingectomy), female relying on male partner's sterilization for contraception; sterilization is a most effective method of contraception),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes for surveillance or history of female sterilization (e.g., bilateral tubal ligation, bilateral salpingectomy), female relying on male partner's sterilization for contraception; sterilization is a most effective method of contraception),(Exclusion Criteria: Any contraceptive method that is not sterilization; Most effective (i.e., IUDs or IUSs, contraceptive implants) or moderately effective (i.e., injectables, oral pills, patch, or ring) methods of contraception; Less effective methods of contraception (i.e., diaphragm, male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods, spermicide))
